thread.title: Ford Motor Company Declares Dividend for Second Quarter 2018

title: Ford Motor Company Declares Dividend for Second Quarter 2018

organizations.name: ford motor company ford motor company

text:
DEARBORN, Mich.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- The Board of Directors of Ford Motor Company declared a second quarter regular dividend of $0.15 per share on the companyâ€™s outstanding Class B and common stock.
The second quarter regular dividend maintains the same level as the dividends paid in 2017 and in the first quarter of 2018.
The second quarter regular dividend is payable on June 1, 2018 to shareholders of record at the close of business on April 20, 2018.
About Ford Motor Company
Ford Motor Company is a global company based in Dearborn, Michigan. The company designs, manufactures, markets and services a full line of Ford cars, trucks, SUVs, electrified vehicles and Lincoln luxury vehicles, provides financial services through Ford Motor Credit Company and is pursuing leadership positions in electrification, autonomous vehicles and mobility solutions. Ford employs approximately 202,000 people worldwide. For more information regarding Ford, its products and Ford Motor Credit Company, please visit www.corporate.ford.com .
For news releases, related materials and high-resolution photos and video, visit www.media.ford.com .
